title: League client is a meme at this point
body:
Its so disgusting to even open up the client at this point, you wanna queue up and find a match? oops! you cant because as soon as you press "Accept" You will be stuck on that screen forever and you'll have to close the client, then reopen and it will send you to riot client, you'll introduce your account data to log in, and its gonna move you onto the "Play" Screen just to troll you even more, it will let you click but nothing will happen for 20 mins.

You want to see your friends list? You can't and the names aren't even displayed right now, nor the profile pics are getting displayed, you want to make a lobby for any queue? You can't invite everyone cause apparently that one friend of yours who wants to join the lobby and play a match with you is in a nonexistent match. 

You want to ban a champion on ranked champ select? Try it, you won't be able to because the client will freeze out of nowhere for no reason and you'll have to lose 3 lp then 5 then 10 because it decided to freeze 3 times in a row.

You want to see your match history? Good luck with the eternal loading screen
Your profile? Pray to god your able to lol
Want to open your hex tech crafting chests or capsules you just got last match? Hope that luck is on your side because either it loads or it never loads up.

As soon as you open this ugly terrible client that can barely launch your mood to play is completely crushed, seriously, every single time I want to play league now I open the client then I just close it because apparently I have to wait a while for it to load the play button.

And im sure theres been way more issues over the last 2 weeks and theres comments about it everywhere; Twitter, Reddit, Even the newest league cinematic, its just so pathetic that a company with this much money has 0 standards for quality when it comes to its main product which is the game. 

Nice way to start the 10 year anniversary riot, a wonderful  service to your players!!!
